nodes.text: A holostar, also called a holoactor was a noted performer in holodramas. Holostars were quite often wealthy from their success in the entertainment industry and widely recognizable. Notable holostars included Amber Jevanche, Garik Loran, Tetran Cowall, Rex Shaxrigge, Syal Antilles Fel, known as Wynssa Starflare and Javul Charn
